tasks.title: Setup TypeScript Interfaces and Data Models
tasks.description: Create TypeScript type definitions for Course, Chapter, and Episode data models as specified in the PRD
tasks.testStrategy: Verify TypeScript compilation passes without errors. Import types in a test component to ensure they are accessible. Check that all required properties are defined according to PRD specifications.

tasks.title: Configure Design System and Theme Setup
tasks.description: Set up the dark theme with gold/amber color palette using Tailwind CSS v4, configure typography, and establish the premium forex aesthetic
tasks.testStrategy: Create a test page displaying all color variables, typography scales, and spacing. Visually verify the premium dark theme aesthetic matches the Bloomberg Terminal meets modern streaming reference.

tasks.title: Install and Configure Framer Motion and Shadcn/ui Components
tasks.description: Add Framer Motion for animations and set up required shadcn/ui components for the application
tasks.testStrategy: Render each shadcn component on a test page to verify styling. Test Framer Motion animations by creating simple animated elements. Verify all components respect the dark theme.

tasks.title: Create Base Layout Components
tasks.description: Build the header, footer, and sidebar navigation components that will be used across the application
tasks.testStrategy: Render layout components in isolation and as part of the main layout. Test responsive behavior at mobile, tablet, and desktop breakpoints. Verify navigation links work correctly.

tasks.title: Create Mock Data for Course Content
tasks.description: Build comprehensive mock data following the sample course structure provided in the PRD appendix
tasks.testStrategy: Write unit tests for helper functions. Verify all 5 chapters and 20 episodes are properly structured. Test getNextEpisode and getPreviousEpisode navigation logic.

tasks.title: Build Landing Page
tasks.description: Create the marketing landing page with hero section, features, curriculum preview, testimonials, and CTA
tasks.details:
Create `app/(marketing)/page.tsx`:

```typescript
// Hero Section
- Large headline: 'Master Forex Trading with Abdu Academi'
- Subheadline with value proposition
- CTA button with gold gradient
- Course preview image/video thumbnail
- Animated entrance using Framer Motion

// Features Section
- 3-4 key benefits with Phosphor icons
- Card layout with hover effects
- Gold accent borders

// Curriculum Preview
- Accordion or expandable chapter list
- Show episode count per chapter
- Teaser of content structure

// Testimonials Section
- Placeholder testimonial cards
- Avatar, name, quote format
- Carousel or grid layout

// CTA Section
- Final call to action
- Enrollment button
- Trust indicators
```

Use Framer Motion for scroll animations and staggered reveals. Ensure mobile responsiveness.
tasks.testStrategy: Visual review of all sections at multiple breakpoints. Test all animations trigger correctly on scroll. Verify CTA buttons have proper hover states and link to course page.

tasks.title: Build Course Overview Page with Chapter Cards
tasks.description: Create the main course page displaying all chapters as interactive cards with progress indicators
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all chapters render correctly from mock data. Test navigation to chapter detail pages. Check progress indicators display correctly. Test responsive grid layout.

tasks.title: Build Chapter Detail Page with Episode List
tasks.description: Create the chapter page showing all episodes within a chapter with completion status and navigation
tasks.testStrategy: Test dynamic routing with different chapter IDs. Verify episode list renders correctly. Test sidebar navigation highlights current chapter. Check completion indicators toggle visually.

tasks.title: Build Video Player Page
tasks.description: Create the video player page with episode navigation, playback controls, and next/previous episode functionality
tasks.testStrategy: Test video playback with placeholder videos. Verify previous/next navigation works correctly including chapter boundaries. Test mark as complete functionality updates UI. Check responsive layout on mobile.

tasks.title: Build Progress Tracking Components
tasks.description: Create visual progress indicators including progress bars, completion badges, and resume functionality
tasks.testStrategy: Test progress bar renders correctly at 0%, 50%, 100%. Verify localStorage persistence works for demo. Test resume functionality returns to correct episode.

tasks.title: Build Admin Layout and Dashboard
tasks.description: Create the admin dashboard layout with sidebar navigation and overview stats cards
tasks.testStrategy: Verify admin layout renders correctly with sidebar. Test navigation between admin pages. Check stats cards display mock data correctly. Verify admin routes are separate from student routes.

tasks.title: Build Chapter Management Interface
tasks.description: Create the admin interface for listing, adding, editing, and reordering chapters
tasks.testStrategy: Test add chapter form validation. Verify edit pre-fills existing data. Test drag-and-drop reordering updates order visually. Verify delete confirmation dialog works.

tasks.title: Build Episode Management Interface
tasks.description: Create the admin interface for managing episodes including upload placeholder functionality
tasks.details:
Create `app/admin/episodes/page.tsx` and related components: ```typescript // app/admin/episodes/page.tsx export default function EpisodeManagement() { return (

Manage Episodes

); } // components/admin/episode-form.tsx - Form fields: title, description, duration, chapterId (select), order - Video upload placeholder: ```typescript

Drag and drop video file or click to browse

Video upload coming soon

``` - Thumbnail upload placeholder - Preview video URL input (for demo with external URLs) // components/admin/episode-list.tsx - Table view with columns: thumbnail, title, chapter, duration, actions - Filter by chapter dropdown - Bulk actions placeholder ```
tasks.testStrategy: Test episode form validation including chapter selection. Verify filter by chapter works correctly. Test upload placeholder displays correctly. Verify episode list shows correct chapter association.

tasks.title: Implement Animations and Micro-interactions
tasks.description: Add Framer Motion animations throughout the application for a premium feel
tasks.testStrategy: Visual review of all animations. Test performance with React DevTools Profiler. Verify animations don't cause layout shifts. Test reduced motion preference is respected.

tasks.title: Implement Loading States and Skeletons
tasks.description: Add loading skeletons and states throughout the application for professional polish
tasks.testStrategy: Test loading states appear correctly during simulated delays. Verify skeletons match the dimensions of actual content. Test Suspense boundaries work correctly with Next.js App Router.

tasks.title: Mobile Responsiveness and Final Polish
tasks.description: Ensure full mobile responsiveness across all pages and add final UI polish
tasks.details:
Comprehensive responsive design pass:

```typescript
// Mobile navigation
- Hamburger menu for header on mobile
- Slide-out drawer for course sidebar
- Bottom navigation bar option for key actions

// Responsive breakpoints
- Mobile: < 640px (single column, stacked layouts)
- Tablet: 640px - 1024px (2 columns, adjusted spacing)
- Desktop: > 1024px (full layout with sidebars)

// Video player mobile
- Full-width video on mobile
- Collapsible episode list below video
- Swipe gestures for next/previous

// Admin mobile
- Collapsible sidebar
- Responsive tables (card view on mobile)
- Touch-friendly form inputs

// Final polish checklist
- Consistent spacing using Tailwind spacing scale
- Focus states for accessibility
- Hover states only on non-touch devices
- Smooth scroll behavior
- Image optimization with next/image
- Meta tags and Open Graph for sharing
```
tasks.testStrategy: Test on actual mobile devices and emulators. Use Chrome DevTools device mode for all breakpoints. Verify touch interactions work correctly. Run Lighthouse audit for mobile performance and accessibility scores.
